idealPlacement.title: Wide Civic Plazas
idealPlacement.description: High-traffic open areas requiring durable, large-scale coverage.

idealPlacement.title: Urban Commercial Sidewalks
idealPlacement.description: Busy retail corridors where floor space is limited but greenery is needed.

idealPlacement.title: Corporate or Academic Courtyards
idealPlacement.description: Semi-private outdoor spaces for quiet gathering or study.

idealPlacement.title: Creative District Pocket Parks
idealPlacement.description: Small-scale urban infill focused on artistic expression and rest.

idealPlacement.title: Eco-Friendly Residential Zones
idealPlacement.description: Community-focused areas prioritizing natural cooling and biodiversity.

idealPlacement.title: Transit Hubs & Tech Parks
idealPlacement.description: High-connectivity areas where commuters or workers need power and data.

idealPlacement.title: Coastal Promenades
idealPlacement.description: Beach-adjacent recreation areas subject to high winds and salt air.
